      • isWithinLogLevel

        public static boolean isWithinLogLevel(java.lang.String logLevel,
                                       java.lang.String line)
        This method checks if a line is within a given level String
        Parameters:
        logLevel - The level to check
        line - The line to check
        Returns:
        A boolean value telling if the line matches

      • log

        @RequestMapping(method=GET)
public Log log(@RequestParam(value="logID",defaultValue="0")
                                           java.lang.Integer logID,
                                           @RequestParam(value="logLevel",defaultValue="DEBUG")
                                           java.lang.String logLevel,
                                           @RequestParam(value="length",defaultValue="250")
                                           int length)
        This method returns the log given the request parameters
        Parameters:
        logID - The log file to return (represented as a integer)
        logLevel - The log level to show
        length - How many lines to return
        Returns:
        A Log model containing the correct log. Will be serialized as JSON
